<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1918]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] attends a medical board examination.  He is found to be fit for general service.
* '''[[1969]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a [[Letter to Mrs Mroczkowska (10 April 1969)
* '''[[1991]]''' – The Revised Edition of [[Karen Wynn Fonstad]]'s ''[[The Atlas of Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[2018]]''' - [[HarperCollins]] announce that ''[[The Fall of Gondolin]]'' will be published on [[30 August]] [[2018]].
